americansamoa.notes: In this system some citizens have private health insurance, some are eligible for subsidized public health care, while some are not insured at all.

japan.notes: In these countries workers have social insurance. Usually government withholds part of their wage, which is divided between employee and employer. People who don't have legal contract of employment and/or can't register as unemployed may be ineligible for free health care.
